titleStmt.title: The Marques Hamiltons speech before the Kings most excellent Majesty: concerning his returne into England. Spoken in Parliament in Scotland, Novem. 6, 1641. VVith a briefe and exact commemoration of all the wicked plots of the papists, from the first intended malice unto this day against the Protestants.
titleStmt.author: Hamilton, James Hamilton, Duke of, 1606-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: First printed at Edinburgh by James Brison, and now reprinted in London for T.B.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
